entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:47 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 12:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: SSW 24 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 9. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
